content: अपनीत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Taken away; removed, pulled off &c. {@--2@} Removed from, deviating from, opposed to, contradictory; तत्त्वधर्मापनीतस्य दृश्यते कर्मणः फलं <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--3@} Badly done or executed, spoiled; अपनीतं सुनीतेन योऽर्थं प्रत्यानिनीषते <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--4@} Paid off, discharged. --तं Bad conduct.
